languages.text: "Уединенно обитая в трудовых лагерях на руинах Сципионы, они получили возможность действовать без лишнего надзора. Но, по крайней мере, их зараза поразила ульи слабее, чем могла бы".

"Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."
languages.original_text: "Уединенно обитая в трудовых лагерях на руинах Сципионы, они получили возможность действовать без лишнего надзора. Но, по крайней мере, их зараза поразила ульи слабее, чем могла бы".

traits.locale_text: "Living alone in the labour camps of the ruined Scipione, they gained the opportunity to act without any interference. But at least their plague has corrupted the hives to a weaker extent that it could."

"Living alone in the labour camps of the ruined Scipione, they gained the opportunity to act without any interference. But at least their plague has corrupted the hives to a weaker extent that it could."

"Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

"Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

"Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

languages.text: “他们独自生活在希皮奥内废墟的劳工定居点，因此能不受拘束地自由行动。但至少，它们的瘟疫传播得并不广泛，巢都的感染状况已经尽可能控制在最低程度。”
languages.original_text: "Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

traits.locale_text: “他们独自生活在希皮奥内废墟的劳工定居点，因此能不受拘束地自由行动。但至少，它们的瘟疫传播得并不广泛，巢都的感染状况已经尽可能控制在最低程度。”

languages.text: «Viviendo solos en los asentamientos de trabajadores de la arruinada Escipión, adquirieron la capacidad de actuar con impunidad. Pero al menos su plaga ha demostrado ser más débil que otras, y la colmena ha sido mínimamente infectada».
languages.original_text: "Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

traits.locale_text: «Viviendo solos en los asentamientos de trabajadores de la arruinada Escipión, adquirieron la capacidad de actuar con impunidad. Pero al menos su plaga ha demostrado ser más débil que otras, y la colmena ha sido mínimamente infectada».

languages.text: 「奴らは、廃墟と化したサイピオーネの労働者居住区で自分達だけで生活し、平然と行動できるようになったんだ。ただ、少なくとも、奴らの疫病の感染力が、他と比べて弱いことが証明され、ハイヴの感染も最小限にとどまった」
languages.original_text: "Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは、廃墟と化したサイピオーネの労働者居住区で自分達だけで生活し、平然と行動できるようになったんだ。ただ、少なくとも、奴らの疫病の感染力が、他と比べて弱いことが証明され、ハイヴの感染も最小限にとどまった」

languages.text: « En vivant reclus dans les sites ouvriers de Scipione en ruine, ils ont pu agir en toute impunité, mais au moins, le mal qu'ils répandent se sera révélé moins virulent que d'autres, et la ruche n'en a été que peu affectée. »
languages.original_text: "Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

traits.locale_text: « En vivant reclus dans les sites ouvriers de Scipione en ruine, ils ont pu agir en toute impunité, mais au moins, le mal qu'ils répandent se sera révélé moins virulent que d'autres, et la ruche n'en a été que peu affectée. »

languages.text: "Sie lebten allein in den Arbeitssiedlungen des zerstörten Scipione und konnten ungehindert schalten und walten. Doch zumindest hat sich ihre Seuche als weniger stark erwiesen als andere. Es gab in der Makropole nur eine minimale Infektion."
languages.original_text: "Living alone in the labour settlements of the ruined Scipione, they gained the ability to act with impunity. But at least their plague has proved weaker than others, and the hive has been minimally infected."

traits.locale_text: "Sie lebten allein in den Arbeitssiedlungen des zerstörten Scipione und konnten ungehindert schalten und walten. Doch zumindest hat sich ihre Seuche als weniger stark erwiesen als andere. Es gab in der Makropole nur eine minimale Infektion."
